article.title: U.S. Export Assistance Centers of Kentucky Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the U.S. Export Assistance Centers of Kentucky.
article.content:
​

Lexington Office Contact Information

Lexington U.S. Export Assistance Center
World Trade Center, 101 E. Vine Street, Suite 150
Lexington, KY 40507
Phone: 859-225-7001
Email:Sara.Moreno@trade.gov
Website:http://www.export.gov/kentucky/

Lexington Staff

Sara Moreno, USEAC Director

Phone: 859-225-7001
Email:Sara.Moreno@trade.gov

Industries:Architectural/Constr./Engineering SVC, Audio/Visual Eq., Biotechnology, Building Products, Coal, Construction Eq., Drugs/Pharmaceuticals, Education/Training Services, Electrical Power Systems, Food Processing/Packaging Eq., Foods - Processed, Franchising, General Consumer Goods, General Industrial Eq./Supplies, General Science & Technology, Giftware, Hotel/Restaurant Eq., Household Consumer Goods, Iron/Steel, Laboratory Scientific Instruments, Mining Industry Eq., Packaging Eq., Pet Foods/Supp., Security/Safety Eq., Textile Machinery/Eq., Travel/Tourism Services, Veterinary Medicine Eq./Supplies, Water Resources Eq./Services

Louisville Office Contact Information

Louisville U.S. Export Assistance Center
601 W. Broadway, Room 634B
Louisville, KY 40202
Phone: 502-582-5066
Fax: 502-582-6573
Email:Peggy.Pauley@trade.gov
Website:http://www.export.gov/kentucky/

Louisville Staff

Peggy Pauley, USEAC Director

Phone: 502-582-5066
Fax: 502-582-6573
Email:Peggy.Pauley@trade.gov

Brian Miller, Senior International Trade Specialist

Phone: 502-582-5066
Fax: 502-582-6573
Email:Brian.Miller@trade.gov

Industries:Aircraft/Aircraft Parts, Automobile/Light Truck/Vans, Automotive Parts/Services Eq., Building Products, Composite Materials, Construction Eq., Consumer Electronics, Defense Industry Eq., Electrical Power Systems, Franchising, Jewelry, Laboratory Scientific Instruments, Medical Eq., Oil/Gas Field Machinery, Oil/Gas/Mineral Prod/Explor Serv., Plastics Materials/Resins, Plastics Production Machinery, Regulations, Sporting Goods/Recreational Eq., Telecommunications Eq.

Mona Musa, Senior International Trade Specialist

Phone: (502)582-5066
Fax: (502)582-6573
Email:Mona.Musa@trade.gov

Industries:Architectural/Constr./Engineering SVC, Franchising, General Consumer Goods, Health Care Services, Hotel/Restaurant Eq., Household Consumer Goods, Jewelry, Laboratory Scientific Instruments, Lawn/Garden Eq., Medical Eq., Mining Industry Eq.

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30​am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the U.S. Export Assistance Centers of Kentucky.
